GapFillDragDrop.Title: Describing characteristics
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the answers to the correct spaces.

Content.Question:
1. It was difficult trying to suggest interesting things to do on holiday with Sarah as she had such a negative attitude towards everything.
2. All our team members were rather quiet and we needed someone chatty and outward going to liven things up.
3. Jenny worked with Laura for five years, but she kept herself to herself and Jenny knew very little about her.
4. Emily is rather grumpy and irritable in the mornings. She’s better once she’s had a strong cup of coffee!
5. Angeline is a great person to go travelling with as she’s so laid-back and never worries about anything.
6. Nothing is ever out of place on Lisa’s desk. It’s always very neat and tidy.
7. Bill’s office has papers, coffee cups and files all over the place. He is really messy.
8. Nika is a very dynamic character. She always gets things going, be it organising a night out or suggesting something interesting to do.
9. Joe never loses his temper, but you can tell when he’s cross, as he goes quiet and sulks.
10. I find Cameron very annoying as he doesn’t like listening to other people’s points of views and likes to have things his way.
